rules.description: Function to Left Command
Left Control to Function
Left Option to Function
Left Command to Left Option
Right Command to Right Option
Right Option to Right Command
Function + ^ to Page Up
Function + ' to Page Down
Left Control to Command
Media key with 3 squares to mission control

Show desktop media key (require changing hotkey in mac system settings). Not supposed to work when
            Caps Lock is active so that we can use the f11 key in Chrome debug tool.
Left Control + Left to rewind media
Left Control + right to fast forward media
Right Shift + Caps Lock to play / pause media
Left Control + Left Shift + p to play / pause | skip in Focus-to-do
Left Control + Left Shift + c to close all notifications | snooze 1 notification
Make modifier keys work properly on remote desktop
Left Control + plus-key to duplicate tab
Left Control + e to mark text (only useful in Notion)
Left Control + r to hard reload
Right Option + Right Shift + t to open Toggl tab
Right Option + Right Shift + n to open Notion tab
Right Option + Right Shift + j to open Jira tab
Right Option + Right Shift + b to open Bitbucket tab
Right Option + Right Shift + a to open Azure tab
Right Option + Right Shift + c to open calendar tab
Right Option + Right Shift + m to open mail tab
Left Control + Å to switch to prev developer pane
Left Control + ¨ to switch to next developer pane
Left Control + i to toggle inspector
Left Control + m to toggle desktop / mobile
Left Control + c to toggle element inspector
Right Option + Right Shift + d to focus dev tools
Right Option + Right Shift + v to focus viewport
Left Control + Tab to alternate between 2 tabs (need Recent Tabs extension)
Right Option + Right Shift + g to open Grebban workspace
Right Option + Right Shift + r to open Royal workspace
Right Option + Right Shift + f to find thread
Right Control + r to run last used terminal command
Left Control + 1 to activate Google Chrome Grebban

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome Grebban" to activate'

rules.description: Left Control + 2 to activate VSCode

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Visual Studio Code" to activate'

rules.description: Left Control + 3 to activate Google Chrome Incognito

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome Incognito" to activate'

rules.description: Left Control + 4 to activate Slack
Left Control + 5 to activate Fork
Left Control + 8 to activate iTerm
Left Control + 9 to activate Google Chrome Personal

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome Personal" to activate'

rules.description: Left Control + 0 to activate Google Chrome YouTube

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome YouTube" to activate'

rules.description: < to Right Control if holding, to tab when pressed alone
Map the number keys to F1, F2, etc.. when Caps Lock is active or Option is pressed
Caps Lock to Left Control if holding, Esc if pressed alone
Esc to Caps Lock
Option + Shift + h/l to Option + Shift + left/right arrow - To highlight words more easily
Option + Shift + j/k to Shift + down/up arrow - To highlight lines more easily in combination with above hotkeys
Right Control + b to go to beginning of the content of the line
Right Control + e to go to end of the line
Left Control + d to delete
Left Control + y to copy
Left Control + z to undo
Left Control + Space to step to the right
Right Control to add a space to the right of the cursor
§ to Delete
Windows style redo
Windows style alt-tab app switching
Within app window switching with Function + Tab
Make the - key mapping correctly when holding Left Shift + Left Option (Ukelele didn't work)
Make enter unblocked when holding Left Shift + Left Option
Show Launchpad with Command-Tab
Move tabs left / right with Left Control + h / l
New tab with Left Control + t
Close tab with Left Control + w
Left Shift + Left Option + d to print today's date

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
            set {year:yr, month:mn, day:dy} to (current date)
            set dateString to (yr as text) & "-" & pad(mn as integer) & "-" & pad(dy)

            on pad(v)
                  return text -2 thru -1 of ((v + 100) as text)
            end pad

            tell application "System Events"
                  keystroke dateString
            end tell
            '

rules.description: Right Control + h / j / k / l to arrow keys
Function + m to minimize window
Function + f to go to fullscreen

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
            tell application "System Events"
                  tell (first process where it is frontmost)
                        if value of attribute "AXFullScreen" of window 1 = false then
                              set value of attribute "AXFullScreen" of window 1 to true
                        else
                              set value of attribute "AXFullScreen" of window 1 to false
                        end if
                  end tell
            end tell
            '

rules.description: Left Control + Left Shift + h / l to move between screens
Option + å to Shift + '+' key in order for ? hotkey to work in Vimium
¨ to Shift + '7' key in order for / hotkey to work in Vimium
Left Control + A / Ö / Å / Ä to select all / copy / cut / paste
Left Command + m to click minimize button (fix: normal hotkey doesn't work with every app, for example VSCode)

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
            tell application "System Events"
                  click (first button whose subrole is "AXMinimizeButton") of (first window whose subrole is "AXStandardWindow") of (first process whose frontmost is true)
            end tell
            '

rules.description: Left Control + Left Shift + m to swap mapping Middle Mouse Button to Minimize Window
long press Left Control + Left Shift + Backspace to empty recycle bin
Left Control + Backspace to delete a word at a time instead of Option + Backspace
